name: components/eventHandler.js
EventHandler
description: Handle all events between the DOM and {@link fonts}

name: components/fonts.js
Fonts
description: Create a Fonts object which handle and collect all fonts from google fonts API

name: getGFonts
description: Fetch the fonts from google fonts api and save theme in stock array property

name: storeFont
description: Store font that has been clicked in localStorage

name: removeFont
description: Remove font from localStorage and update it in stock as well to handle state of add/remove button

name: getFontFromLocalStorage
description: Handle the display of saved fonts by getting the fonts from localStorage and placing them at the begining of the stock array property making shure there is no doublon

name: handleFontsLoad
description: Handle fonts load according to the parameter: scroll, value of input search or the initial loading fonts

params.name: newFontsResearch
params.description: Represents either "scroll" or input search result

name: setUpFonts
description: Handle the loads of fonts according to the boolean value

params.name: fontListIndex
params.description: Respresents the index of iteration through the font list

params.name: incrementor
params.description: Represent the number that increment the {@link fontListIndex}

params.name: bool
params.description: Represent the boolean that indicate how to handle the iteration if either search is: an initial loading fonts, a scroll or an input search

params.name: fontListIndex
params.description: Respresents the index of iteration through the font list

params.name: incrementor
params.description: Represent the number that increment the {@link fontListIndex}

params.name: fontItem
params.description: Object return from the google font API

name: refresh
description: Refresh the page as if it was reloaded

name: createFontContainer
description: Create a font template for each fonts

params.name: font
params.description: Object return from the google font API

params.name: search
params.description: Boolean to know if the query is from research or not

name: handleUrlFonts
description: Format each font name before creating an url

params.name: fontsList
params.description: Object return from the google font API

name: createURL
description: Createand format a final url with all font name

name: components/quotes.js
content:
/**
 *  Array containing the Google sentences
 */
const quotes = [
	"All their equipment and instruments are alive.",
	"A red flare silhouetted the jagged edge of a wing.",
	"I watched the storm, so beautiful yet terrific.",
	"Almost before we knew it, we had left the ground.",
	"A shining crescent far beneath the flying vessel.",
	"It was going to be a lonely trip back.",
	"Mist enveloped the ship three hours out from port.",
	"My two natures had memory in common.",
	"Silver mist suffused the deck of the ship.",
	"The face of the moon was in shadow.",
	"She stared through the window at the stars.",
	"The recorded voice scratched in the speaker.",
	"The sky was cloudless and of a deep dark blue.",
	"The spectacle before us was indeed sublime.",
	"Then came the night of the first falling star.",
	"Waves flung themselves at the blue evening."
];

export default quotes;

/* let test = Math.floor(Math.random() * quotes.length);
console.log(quotes[test]); */
